original_text: We do not need any more to show that our work is good. Some people need to have letters from other people to say that they do good work. We do not need to show you letters like that. Nor do we need you to write a letter like that for us.
korean_text: 우리가 다시 자천하기를 시작하겠느냐 우리가 어찌 어떤 사람처럼 추천서를 너희에게 부치거나 혹은 너희에게 받거나 할 필요가 있느냐

sentences.original_text: We do not need any more
to show that our work is good
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 일이 좋다는 것을 보여주기 위해

sentences.original_text: Some people need to have letters
to say that they do good work
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 좋은 일을 한다고 말하기 위해

sentences.original_text: to show you letters like that
you to write a letter like that for us
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 우리를 위해 그런 편지를 써주는 것을
